name: go-barry-backend
description: Go BARRY Traffic Intelligence Backend - Enhanced with disruption logging and North East alerts

scripts.alerts: curl http://localhost:3001/api/alerts | jq '.alerts | length' || echo 'No alerts or jq not installed'
scripts.memory-check: node -e "console.log('Node.js Memory Limits:'); console.log('Max Old Space:', v8.getHeapStatistics().heap_size_limit / 1024 / 1024, 'MB'); console.log('Available Memory:', process.memoryUsage());"
scripts.memory-test: node --max-old-space-size=2048 --expose-gc -e "console.log('Memory test passed - 2GB heap available'); if(global.gc) console.log('Garbage collection available'); else console.log('Warning: Garbage collection not available');"

author: Go North East
